sentence.Network_en: She wears a hand chain made of cryolite around her wrist.
sentence.Network_cn: 她手腕上戴着一串水晶石的手链.

sentence.Network_en: From the results, solution mechanism of alumina in molten cryolite was discussed.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据测量结果, 讨论了氧化铝在冰晶石熔体中的溶解机理.

sentence.Network_en: The new technology for the preparation of cryolite from fluosilicic acid and ammonium hydrocarbonate is introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了氟硅酸、碳酸氢铵制备冰晶石的新工艺.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from cryo- 'cold, frost' (because the main deposits are found in Greenland) + -lite

means.word_mean: 1. a white mineral consisting of fluorides of aluminum and sodium; a source of fluorine
